item.description:
We all have little voices in our heads, sometimes low and flowing and sometimes loud
and degrading, sometimes loving, but sometimes mean and judging. How those
conversations come to us is interesting but what we do with them is of the most
importance. Did you know you can retrain those voices? You can change a negative
into a positive in seconds. There is a quote that I love, "If you think you can do a
thing or you think you can't do a thing, you are right." The truth of this statement is
you create your reality with your thoughts. Even the little ones, even the quiet ones.
Knowing this is the key to making a change in your thoughts and in your life. Join us
for an evening of change.
 Payments are accepted through Paypal.  Payments will also be accepted the night of the MeetUp at the HSCCenter.
item.how_to_find_us: Off of Northeastern Blvd in Nashua, NH

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Law of Attraction: Conversations with Your Inner Self
